name.value: Visit the Github repository for more information

description.value: a list of specific entity references that are to be included in the definition. When specified in this form, the service must include all entities in this list whether they are known to the service or not, and whether they are currently ACTIVE or not.

definition.value: a list of specific entity references that are to be included in the definition. When specified in this form, the service must include all entities in this list whether they are known to the service or not, and whether they are currently ACTIVE or not.

short.value: the namespace / name or URI of an entity to be included

definition.value: the namespace / name or URI of an entity to be included
